prev
next

Property located in a prime area of ​​the Costa Vicentina, with privileged Sea views. Highlighting the wide variety of existing Vegetation - A unique environment and excellent sun exposure. It is supplied with water from the Irrigation Channel and the Public network. Electricity is from the public grid.

prev
next
Sold
232m²  29.250m²REF PV-M-548

Sale
Charming property located in a quiet and green area. With a ready-to-live-in house of 162sqm, consisting of 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 1 kitchen, pantry, common room and garage. This can be extended up to 300sqm. Next to the house there is a lake, in harmony with the surroundings. The property has a wide variety of fruit trees, vineyards, garden and is supported by a building of 70sqm.

The building is divided into 3 fractions (Studio, T1 and T2) Very versatile space, which allows immediate profitability of the space. The renovation was carried out respecting the environment and using natural materials You will immediately feel at home, with the colors, textures and good vibe. Charming place where you can live with your family and friends 15 minutes from Aljezur and only 20 minutes from the main beaches

Property situated on the Costa Vicentina, close to Odeceixe and 8.5 km from Aljezur. Easy access, about 1.5 km from EN 120. With a Unique Natural Beauty, having several clusters of trees, pinetrees and corkoak trees, a charming Spring and nooks overlooking the Serra de Monchique. The ruin, benefits from excellent sun exposure, and can be enlarged up to 300sqm. With great potential in the development of a Rural Tourism (600sqm), Reforestation and/or Agricultural Project.
